item.title: Scan, share, done: WhatsApp update brings in-app scanning for iOS users - details - Mint
item.description:
WhatsApp Introduces In-App Document Scanning for iOS Users

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Live Mint

WhatsApp has launched an in-app scanning feature for iOS users, enhancing document sharing by allowing users to scan documents directly within the app.

Key Points

  • New in-app scanning feature is available in the latest WhatsApp update (version 24.25.80).
  • This feature allows users to scan documents without external tools.
  • Users can adjust scan margins for better quality.
  • The update is currently being rolled out to a select group of iOS users.
  • The feature aims to streamline document sharing for personal and professional use.
“The ability to scan and send documents directly within the instant messaging app removes the reliance on third-party scanning apps.”

This update is seen as a significant improvement in WhatsApp's document-sharing capabilities, making it a more comprehensive communication tool.

item.title: Meta adding display to new Ray-Ban smart glasses: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
Meta adding display to new Ray-Ban smart glasses: Report

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 Source: The Financial Times

Meta is set to enhance their Ray-Ban smart glasses with a display expected to launch in late 2025. The display will allow users to view notifications and interact with Meta's AI assistant, reflecting the company's commitment to advancing wearable technology.

  • The new Ray-Ban smart glasses will feature a screen for notifications.
  • Meta's Orion AR glasses were recently demoed but deemed too expensive for production.
  • Google and Samsung are introducing their own Android XR glasses in 2025.
  • The previous Ray-Ban edition included in-ear speakers, cameras, and microphones, and saw successful sales after launch.
  • Meta's CTO indicates that 2025 will be crucial for the company's Reality Labs division.
“2025 would be the most important year in the history of Reality Labs.” - Andrew Bosworth, CTO of Meta

This advancement in Meta's smart glasses signifies a focus on integrating more features and competing in the wearable tech market.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G launched with 5500 mAh battery and 50 MP AI camera - The Hindu
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G launched with 5500 mAh battery and 50 MP AI camera

Published on: December 24, 2024 Source: Vivo India

The Vivo Y29 5G smartphone was recently launched, offering significant features including a large battery and advanced camera technology.

  • Powered by Dimensity 6300 platform with four storage options.
  • 6.68-inch LCD display with 1608 × 720 resolution and 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Equipped with a robust 5500 mAh battery supporting 44W charging.
  • Long video playback and gaming support with substantial battery life.
  • IP64 rated for dust and water resistance.
  • Camera features include a 50 MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera with AI capabilities.
  • Available in four storage variants with multiple color options.
“The battery can maintain 80% health over 4 years, ensuring peak performance and reliability for everyday needs.”

In conclusion, the Vivo Y29 5G smartphone is designed to cater to diverse user needs while ensuring longevity and high performance.

item.title: Scientists revealed the survival strategies of some of the primitive organisms on earth - PIB
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: iPhone 18 Pro could be Apple’s first with Variable Aperture Lens, analyst suggests | Mint - Mint
item.description:
iPhone 18 Pro could feature Variable Aperture Lens, says analyst

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Live Mint

The tech world is buzzing with anticipation of Apple’s iPhone 18 series, slated for launch in 2026. Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has predicted a significant upgrade in the iPhone 18 Pro's camera, introducing variable aperture technology.

  • Apple plans to equip the iPhone 18 Pro’s camera with a variable aperture, allowing for better control over light intake and improved image quality in various lighting conditions.
  • This technology is already available in some Android smartphones, indicating a move towards DSLR-like capabilities for Apple users.
  • BE Semiconductor (BESI) will be a key supplier for the necessary equipment for this new feature.
  • Future advancements include Apple's M5 series processors, expected to use TSMC’s advanced N3P node technology.
  • The iPhone 17 line-up is also anticipated to include under-display Face ID technology and advanced camera features.
“If realised, the iPhone 18 Pro would be the first Apple device to adopt such a feature, underlining the company’s commitment to camera innovation.”

This potential upgrade marks a significant step for Apple in enhancing photographic capabilities and illustrates its ongoing commitment to innovation in smartphone technology.

item.title: Apple may be working on a smart doorbell with Face ID and iCloud support - The Indian Express
item.description:
Apple May Be Developing a Smart Doorbell with Face ID and iCloud Features

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Indian Express

Apple is reportedly working on a new smart doorbell that would utilize Face ID technology. This innovative device aims to enhance home security by unlocking the door automatically when a resident approaches.

  • Analyst Mark Gurman indicates that the smart doorbell will feature Face ID similar to that on iPhone.
  • The device may incorporate Apple’s Secure Enclave chip for processing Face ID data.
  • It is expected to be compatible with existing HomeKit smart locks and utilize Apple’s new Proxima chip for connectivity.
  • The doorbell could back up Face ID data to iCloud, boosting Apple’s cloud subscription services.
  • A new 6-inch touchscreen smart home hub may also accompany the doorbell launch.
  • Expected release date is in late 2025.
“The device will likely work with existing HomeKit-compatible smart locks.” - Mark Gurman

The upcoming smart doorbell reflects Apple's ongoing commitment to expanding its home automation and security product line, promising enhanced user experience through advanced technology.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 Series confirmed to launch India: Colours, design, and more - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Confirmed for Launch in India

Date: Dec 24, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The Oppo Reno 13 series has been officially confirmed for launch in India. The phones were initially launched in China, and the brand has now teased their arrival.

  • The series includes Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro models.
  • Specifications are likely to match the Chinese versions featuring MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset.
  • Expected color options include Ivory White and Luminous Blue for Reno 13, and Graphite Grey and Mist Lavender for Reno 13 Pro.
  • Both phones are expected to have premium builds with an aluminium frame and glass back.
  • Expectations include a 50MP front camera and a dual-camera setup on the Reno 13.
"The teaser featured an animation showcasing the phone, but no further details were provided."

The Oppo Reno 13 series is anticipated to create a buzz once it launches, given its expected high-end features and design.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 5,500mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G With 5,500mAh Battery, 44W Fast Charging Launched in India

Publication Date: Tuesday | Source: Gadgets 360

The Vivo Y29 5G smartphone has been launched in India, featuring a robust design, powerful battery, and fast charging capabilities.

  • Backed by a 5,500mAh battery with 44W wired fast charging.
  • IP64-rated build for dust and splash resistance; claims of military-grade durability.
  • Available in multiple RAM and storage configurations: 4GB + 128GB, 6GB + 128GB, and 8GB + 128GB/256GB.
  • Price starts at Rs. 13,999, with cashback offers available.
  • Features a 6.68-inch HD LCD screen with 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC.
“The cushioning structure acts as drop-resistant armour.” - Vivo

The Vivo Y29 5G is positioned as a mid-range smartphone catering to durability and performance, now available for Indian consumers.

item.title: Nothing Phone 3a Tipped to Get Telephoto Camera, Phone 3a Plus May Carry Periscope Zoom Sensor - Gadgets 360
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Samsung Scaling Down Production of Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7: Report - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Scales Down Production of Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung has reportedly reduced its production plans for the upcoming Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7 due to poor sales of the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6.

  • Production plans cut to a total of around 5 million units for both models.
  • Galaxy Z Flip 7 targets 3 million units, Galaxy Z Fold 7 at 2 million units.
  • Previous cumulative target for Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 was 8.2 million units.
  • Pre-orders for current models decreased from 1.02 million to 910,000 units in Korea.
  • Sales of the current foldables fell by 16.3% year-on-year.
“The weak sales performance of the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 seem to be the reason behind Samsung's decision to scale down production.”

In contrast, Samsung plans to increase production for its Galaxy S25 series, targeting roughly 37 million units.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 5G Series Global Launch Teased; Design, Colourway, Build Details Revealed - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 5G Series Global Launch Teased; Colourway, Build Details Revealed

Date: October 2023
Source: Gadgets 360

The Oppo Reno 13 5G series is set to launch globally soon, with confirmed colour options and build details. The lineup will feature AI-backed functionalities and a robust design.

  • Launch confirmed for global markets outside China.
  • IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
  • AI features like AI Livephoto and AI Editor included.
  • Butterfly Shadow Design with a unique back panel pattern.
  • Equipped with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoCs.
  • 50-megapixel dual rear camera and 50-megapixel selfie camera on all models.
  • Support for fast charging with 5,600mAh and 5,800mAh batteries respectively.
The global versions will come with "all-round armour" protection.

As the launch date approaches, the phones are anticipated to mirror their Chinese counterparts in features and specifications.

item.title: vivo Y29 5G launches in India: Check price, features, and specifications - CNBCTV18
item.description:
vivo Y29 5G launches in India: Check price, features, and specifications

Publication date: Tuesday

Source: CNBC TV18

The vivo Y29 5G has been launched in India as the latest addition to vivo's Y series, featuring advanced specifications and performance.

  • 6.64-inch LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 1,000 nits brightness.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset with options for up to 8GB RAM and 256GB storage.
  • 50MP rear camera with AI Night Mode and an 8MP front camera.
  • 5,500mAh battery with 44W FlashCharge for fast recharging.
  • Available in three colors: Glacier Blue, Titanium Gold, and Diamond Black.
  • Military Grade resistance and an IP64 rating for dust and water resistance.
  • Price options:
    • 4GB + 128GB: ₹13,999
    • 6GB + 128GB: ₹15,499
    • 8GB + 128GB: ₹16,999
    • 8GB + 256GB: ₹18,999
  • Cashback offers up to ₹1,500 available with certain banks.
"The vivo Y29 5G is designed with a strong internal structure for improved longevity."

The launch of the vivo Y29 5G highlights vivo's commitment to offering high-spec smartphones at competitive prices in the Indian market.

item.title: WhatsApp adds party popper emoji as seventh default message reaction - The Indian Express
item.description:
WhatsApp Adds Party Popper Emoji as Seventh Default Message Reaction

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

WhatsApp is gearing up for the holiday season with a new default message reaction, the party popper emoji, available on Android and iOS.

  • The party popper emoji can now be easily accessed in the default reaction tray, enhancing user experience.
  • WhatsApp is also introducing confetti animations for emojis like the Confetti Ball and Partying Face when reacted to.
  • The party popper emoji is available in individual and group chats, as well as channels.
  • These features are available in the latest version of WhatsApp on both Android and iOS.
"The addition of the party popper emoji is likely temporary, while the confetti feature may remain post-holiday season."

With the new features, WhatsApp continues to enhance user engagement and celebrate the holiday spirit through innovative emoji reactions.

item.title: Christmas, Boxing Day, New Year Top Discounts And Deals From Amazon, Flipkart - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Top Discounts from Amazon and Flipkart for Christmas and New Year

Date: 24 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit News

With Christmas and New Year fast approaching, Amazon and Flipkart have launched significant sales featuring numerous discounts on a variety of products.

  • Flipkart's Big Saving Days are active from Dec. 20 to Dec. 25 offering discounts on phones, laptops, and apparel.
  • The iPhone 15 is discounted to Rs 59,999 with card offers.
  • Branded apparel discounts reach up to 80%.
  • Amazon features Christmas offers on cameras, smartwatches, and skincare products.
  • Samsung provides discounts up to Rs 12,000 on Galaxy devices.
  • IndiGo launches a Getaway Sale with discounts on domestic and international flights.
“This might just be the time to upgrade your tech or gift new apparel.”

Shoppers are encouraged to take advantage of these lucrative deals as companies ramp up sales for the holiday season.

item.title: Meta Ray-Bans to feature AI assistant, display in 2025 update: Report - The Financial Express
item.description:
Meta plans to release updated Ray-Ban smart glasses with AI assistant and display in 2025

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Financial Times

The latest update for Meta’s Ray-Ban smart glasses is set for release in the second half of 2025, featuring a new display and AI assistant capabilities.

  • Updated Ray-Ban glasses to include a small display for notifications.
  • Mark Zuckerberg sees smart glasses as a new computing platform.
  • Meta plans significant investment in augmented-reality (AR) technology.
  • Development of Orion AR glasses is also underway, enabling interaction with virtual objects.
“There are big plans toward the metaverse envisioned by the company’s Reality Labs division.” - Andrew Bosworth, Meta Chief Technology Officer

In conclusion, Meta's advancements in AR and AI technology signify a step towards integrating more advanced features in wearable tech.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks: Here's When Samsung's New Flagships Are Expected To Be Up For Preorders - ABP Live
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks: Here's When Samsung's New Flagships Are Expected To Be Up For Preorders

Publication Date: January 1, 2024 Source: Fnnews.com

Samsung is set to unveil its much-anticipated Galaxy S25 series on January 22, 2024, with preorders starting on January 24 and an official launch on February 7, 2025. Exciting details about the smartphone models, including potential surprises, are generating buzz among enthusiasts.

  • Preorders in South Korea from January 24 to February 3.
  • The Galaxy S25 series will have a wide international availability expected in early February.
  • The Galaxy S25 Slim is anticipated to be ultra-thin, while the Ultra model aims for high-performance specs.
  • Vibrant color options include shades like Blue Black, Coral Red, and a luxurious finish for the S25 Ultra.
“As the countdown begins for Samsung’s Unpacked event, all eyes are on the Galaxy S25 series to see how it will redefine the premium smartphone experience.”

As Samsung prepares for its Galaxy Unpacked event, excitement builds around the new features and models defined by cutting-edge technology and design.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 256GB gets massive price drop, available for just Rs 2,065 per month - India TV News
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S23 256GB gets massive price drop, available for just Rs 2,065 per month

Date & Source: Flipkart Big Saving Days Sale

The Samsung Galaxy S23 is on sale during Flipkart's Big Saving Days, offering substantial discounts on the 256GB model. The phone is now priced significantly lower than usual, making it an excellent buy.

Key Points:

  • The Galaxy S23 5G series is part of the ongoing Big Saving Days Sale on Flipkart.
  • The 256GB model has seen a price drop of up to 55 percent, listed now at Rs 42,999 from around Rs 1 lakh.
  • Using a Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card grants an additional 5 percent cashback.
  • Trade-in offers can further reduce the price by up to Rs 24,700.
  • The phone features a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset.
  • Camera system includes three rear lenses (50MP, 10MP, 12MP) and a 12MP front camera.
"It's a fantastic opportunity to upgrade your device at a great price."

In conclusion, the Samsung Galaxy S23 is not only a powerful smartphone but also now available at an incredibly attractive price during Flipkart's special sale.

item.title: Apple iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro Available with Huge Discounts on Flipkart Sale: Check The Offers - HerZindagi English
item.description:
Huge Discounts on Apple iPhone 15 and 15 Pro During Flipkart Sale

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: Herzindagi

Flipkart's Big Saving Days Sale features substantial discounts on the iPhone 15 series valid until December 25, 2024, including bank and exchange offers.

  • The iPhone 15 (128GB) is discounted to ₹57,999 from ₹69,900, with an additional ₹1,000 discount available for HDFC Bank Credit Card EMI transactions.
  • The iPhone 15 Pro starts at ₹1,03,999, down from ₹1,34,900, providing savings of approximately ₹32,710.
  • Significant exchange offers are available, allowing customers to save up to ₹56,850 based on the condition of their old smartphone.
  • Additional bank offers include a 10% discount up to ₹1,000 for EMI transactions via HDFC Bank Credit Cards.
“The iPhone 15 still stands as a strong option for everyday users.”

The ongoing sale provides a great opportunity for consumers looking to purchase an iPhone at reduced prices, emphasizing both value and savings.

item.title: Meta’s Ray-Ban smart glasses might soon show notifications on built-in screens - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Meta’s Ray-Ban Smart Glasses to Feature Notification Displays

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: CNBC TV18

Meta is planning to introduce a display feature in its Ray-Ban smart glasses, potentially allowing users to view notifications directly on the device.

  • Report suggests the addition of screens may occur by the second half of 2025.
  • Displays are expected to show notifications or interact with Meta's virtual assistant.
  • This move is part of Meta's broader strategy to enhance its wearable technology line.
  • Meta's Orion augmented reality glasses prototype was recently unveiled and has garnered positive feedback.
  • Since their launch, the smart glasses have gained popularity among users.
“The small display would be likely to be used to show notifications or responses from Meta’s virtual assistant.”

In conclusion, Meta's advancements in smart glasses signify a competitive push in the wearable technology market, alongside rivals like Apple and Google.

item.title: Sega Says It's Considering Launching a Subscription Service for Its Games - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Sega Says It's Considering Launching a Game Subscription Service

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Gadgets 360

Sega is exploring the possibility of launching its own video game subscription service similar to Netflix and Xbox Game Pass. Although details are scarce, the company is evaluating options to join other publishers in offering its games digitally for a monthly fee.

  • Sega is assessing its options for a new game subscription service.
  • The company has a wealth of popular franchises like Sonic, Yakuza, and Persona.
  • Sega's president, Shuji Utsumi, expressed interest in subscription models during a recent interview.
  • Existing services like Xbox Game Pass and PlayStation Plus have popularized the subscription model in gaming.
  • Sega plans to revive its brand and confidence in the gaming industry.
“I want to make Sega really shiny again,” said Utsumi, emphasizing the company's great RPG group and well-known IPs.

This potential shift could position Sega alongside other major players in the subscription gaming market, benefiting fans and the industry alike.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air vs iPhone 17 Pro: 5 rumoured specs - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air vs iPhone 17 Pro: 5 rumoured specs

Published on: November 2024 by India Today

The iPhone 17 series is set to introduce a new model, the iPhone 17 Air, which may outshine the iPhone 17 Pro in several aspects.

  • The iPhone 17 series will feature four models, replacing the Plus with the Air variant.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is rumoured to be the thinnest iPhone ever, potentially beating the iPhone 6's thickness.
  • While the iPhone 17 Pro maintains similar dimensions to the previous model, the Air will showcase a unique design.
  • The iPhone 17 Pro will retain a 6.9-inch display, while the Air will have a 6.6-inch display, catering to those seeking a middle ground.
  • Rumours suggest the iPhone 17 Air will be priced similarly to the iPhone 16 Plus, making it more budget-friendly compared to the Pro variant.
  • Key differences in network technology: the Pro will use Qualcomm's modem, whereas the Air will feature Apple's new in-house modem.
"The iPhone 17 Pro will definitely come with a higher price tag compared to the iPhone 17 Air."

The upcoming iPhone 17 Air is set to challenge the Pro model by offering competitive specs at a more accessible price.

item.description:
POCO F7 specifications tipped ahead of launch: Snapdragon 8s Elite, 7,000mAh battery, and more

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: 91mobiles

The POCO F7 series is expected to include three models, with key specifications leaked ahead of its launch. The series will feature a Snapdragon 8s Elite chipset and a large 7,000mAh battery.

  • The POCO F7 series could comprise POCO F7, POCO F7 Pro, and POCO F7 Ultra models.
  • Snapdragon 8s Elite chipset expected to debut, more powerful than Snapdragon 8 Gen 2.
  • First devices with Snapdragon 8s Elite anticipated to launch in April 2025.
  • The POCO F7 may feature a 1.5K LTPS AMOLED display and 90W fast charging.
  • POCO F6 previously launched in India in May 2023, with expectations for a similar pricing structure for the F7 series.
“Phones with 7,000mAh battery and above are coming soon,” - Digital Chat Station.

The launch of the POCO F7 series is highly anticipated, particularly in light of the new features and specifications that cater to user demands.

item.title: iPhone 15 Flipkart sale: For just Rs 26,999– Huge discounts, exchange offers and 14-minute delivery! - ET Now
item.description:
iPhone 15 Flipkart sale: For just Rs 26,999– Huge discounts, exchange offers and 14-minute delivery!

Updated Dec 24, 2024 | Source: ET Now News

Flipkart is offering the iPhone 15 (128GB, Black) for an incredible price of Rs 26,999, down from the original price of Rs 69,990, thanks to massive discounts and exchange offers.

  • The iPhone 15 is now priced at Rs 58,499 after a 16% discount from its MRP.
  • With potential exchange savings of up to Rs 31,500, customers can buy the iPhone 15 for as low as Rs 26,999.
  • Flipkart’s delivery service promises the new iPhone within 14 minutes in select locations.
  • The iPhone 15 features Apple's Dynamic Island, a stunning 6.1-inch display, pro-level camera capabilities, a USB-C port, and is powered by the A16 Bionic chip.
"Don't miss out on this amazing deal—get your hands on the iPhone 15 for Rs 26,999 before it's gone!"

This sale presents a golden opportunity for tech lovers to grab Apple’s flagship device at an unbeatable price.

item.title: iPhone 18 Pro Series to Feature Variable Aperture Cameras: Ming-Chi Kuo - Gadgets 360
item.description:
iPhone 18 Pro Series May Borrow This DSLR-Like Camera Feature

Publication Date: November 2023 | Source: Gadgets 360

Rumors are circulating about the iPhone 18 series, expected to launch in 2026, with predictions of advanced camera technology including a variable aperture feature that aims to enhance image quality significantly.

  • Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggests the iPhone 18 Pro will include a variable aperture camera.
  • This new lens technology allows users to control light intake, previously seen in devices like Xiaomi 14 Ultra and Galaxy S9.
  • Apple's M5 chipset series is also expected to roll out using TSMC's advanced packaging.
  • iPhone 17 series models will introduce new under-display Face ID technology and enhanced camera setups.
“With a variable aperture lens, users can adjust the amount of light that is captured.” - Ming-Chi Kuo

This innovation in the iPhone 18 lineup could position Apple as a significant player in smartphone photography, following trends initiated by competitors.

item.title: The video games you may have missed in 2024 - The Guardian
item.description:
The Video Games You May Have Missed in 2024

Date: 2024

Source: The Guardian

This article highlights a selection of notable video games released or anticipated in 2024, emphasizing their unique gameplay mechanics, artistic styles, and the creators behind them.

  • Nine Sols: A 2D action-platformer with a “taopunk” aesthetic developed by Red Candle Games.
  • Ultros: A psychedelic action game focusing on gardening in a bioluminescent environment.
  • Manor Lords: A breakout strategy game combining economic management and city survival.
  • SteamWorld Heist II: A tactical turn-based shooter with nautical elements.
  • Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl: A horror survival shooter with a focus on narrative and world-building.
  • The Crush House: A “thirst person shooter” set in a reality TV show context.
  • Frostpunk 2: A city-building survival game with an expanded scope from its predecessor.
  • Peglin: A roguelike game merging elements of Peggle with RPG mechanics.
  • Braid: Anniversary Edition: A remastered version of the classic puzzle-platformer.
  • Kill Knight: A complex twin-stick shooter with both melee and ranged combat.
  • Caravan SandWitch: An exploration-focused game set on an alien planet.
  • Wilmot Works It Out: A unique puzzle game centered on jigsaw assembly.
  • LinkedIn games: A series of browser-based logic games launched by LinkedIn.
  • Pepper Grinder: A fast-paced 2D platformer where you equip a drilling device.
  • The Plucky Squire: A storybook-inspired adventure game combining action and puzzles.
  • Death of the Reprobate: A comedic point-and-click adventure based on Renaissance art.
  • Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster: A remastered version of the cult classic FPS.
  • Duck Detective: A whodunnit game blending investigation with absurdity.
  • Arctic Eggs: A dystopian cooking simulator.
  • Riven: A remake of the classic puzzle game known for its depth and complexity.
  • Still Wakes the Deep: A horror-thriller set on an oil rig.
  • Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth: Part of the beloved Yakuza series, rich in story and character.
  • Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess: A mashup of genres focusing on defense and combat.
  • Botany Manor: A peaceful puzzle game based on gardening.
  • Homeworld 3: A highly anticipated return to real-time strategy.
  • Pacific Drive: A survival-exploration game focusing on car mechanics.
  • What the Car?: An unconventional racing game that defies automotive norms.

item.title: iPhone 15, and iPhone 15 Pro Flipkart Big Saving Days sale: Now starts at Rs 57,999 - The Indian Express
item.description:
iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro Now on Sale at Flipkart Starting at Rs 57,999

Publication Date: September 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Flipkart has announced a price reduction on the iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro as part of its Big Saving Days sale, making them more accessible for buyers.

  • iPhone 15 now starts at Rs 57,999 for the 128 GB variant.
  • iPhone 15 Pro discounted to Rs 1,03,999.
  • The iPhone 15 lacks Apple Intelligence compared to the iPhone 15 Pro that features the A17 Pro chip.
  • Both models include USB-C ports and have updated features.
  • iPhone 15 Pro continues to receive updates despite being discontinued.
“The iPhone 15 is still a compelling choice for mid-range buyers, especially for everyday usage.”

This sale presents a great opportunity for customers looking to upgrade to an iPhone without spending a premium.

item.title: WhatsApp to STOP supporting these Smartphones from January 2025: Check the full list - India TV News
item.description:
WhatsApp to Stop Supporting Certain Smartphones from January 2025

Publication Date: December 1, 2024 | Source: India TV News

WhatsApp has announced that it will cease support for several smartphones starting January 2025. Users on older devices may face issues accessing the app.

  • WhatsApp will discontinue support for devices running Android KitKat, launched in 2013.
  • Users of Samsung Galaxy S3, Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Ace 3, and Galaxy S4 Mini will also be affected.
  • Motorola devices including Moto G, Moto Razr HD, and Moto E 2014 will lose support.
  • HTC One X, One X+, Desire 500, and Desire 601 will no longer be supported.
  • Users of LG Optimus G, Nexus 4, G2 Mini, and L90 models will be impacted.
  • Additionally, Sony Xperia Z, Xperia SP, Xperia T, and Xperia V will stop supporting WhatsApp.
“If you are using a very old smartphone then, here is a bad news.”

As technology advances, users are encouraged to upgrade their devices to continue using WhatsApp effectively.
